Question: Vine asserted her own abiding attraction to "the beauty and the tragedy of this person's life".
Hints: This person moved to London in 1978 and lived in her mother's flat, as her mother then spent most of the year in Scotland.
In June 1995, this person went to Venice to visit the Venice Biennale art festival.
In 2005 Martin Sastre premiered during the Venice Biennial the film this person: The Rose Conspiracy.
